name: DOCS_RCVD_CLM
description: This table stores information about claims received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CLAIM_SRC_PAYER_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the claim's source payer.

columns.name: CLAIM_SRC_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the free text name of the source of the claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_SRC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the identifier of the claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_START_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the date on the claim that services were first rendered.

columns.name: CLAIM_END_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the date on the claim that services were last rendered.

columns.name: CLAIM_LOC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the location mapped to the facility record of the claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_LOC_TEXT
columns.description: This item stores the free text location of the claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_LOC_ADDR_STREET
columns.description: This item stores the street component of the address for the claim's source.

columns.name: CLAIM_LOC_ADDR_CITY
columns.description: This item stores the city component of the address for the claim's source.

columns.name: CLAIM_LOC_ADDR_STATE
columns.description: This item stores the state component of the address for the claim's source.

columns.name: CLAIM_LOC_ADDR_ZIP
columns.description: This item stores the zip code component of the address for the claim's source.

columns.name: CLAIM_LOC_ADDR_COUNTRY
columns.description: This item stores the country component of the address for the claim's source.

columns.name: CLAIM_EVENT_ID
columns.description: This item holds the event identifier of the event information for the claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_IS_RMVD_YN
columns.description: Used for auditing purposes to mark whether or not a claim source was removed from the source record
